Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2009 08:35AM hollyberry wrote: Hi... Radiation will boost blood sugar numbers. I had rads Jan-Feb of 2007... I was a new diabetic (Diabetes and cancer dx from one physical!). I did see my numbers rise. Whenever the body is experiencing trauma and healing Â glucose numbers will rise as the body tries to repair itself. I found too that as I got more fatigued it was extremely difficult to concentrate on what I was supposed to be eating! Peace, Holly
Posts.Title: Radiation and diabetes dietcoke hollyberry
